Eninum, avarkalum (innapiyaip parri tankal vetattil) tankalukkuk kurappattirunta pakattai marantu vittarkal. Atalal, avarkalukkul pakaimaiyaiyum kopattaiyum marumai nal varai (ninkatirukkumpati) muttivittom. (Ivvulakil) avarkal enna ceytu kontiruntarkal enpatai (marumaiyil) allah avarkalukku etuttuk kanpippan
